entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm except locally 40 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers and ending near noon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
